name: Jaga (e-wilk)
description: Jaga is a game made for PolskiGamedev.pl: Game Jam. It was created in a week's time by Zuzanna Kopczyńska, Karolina Więckowska, Edyta Wilk and Szymon Zieliński. it's our first game for that kind of event and presents the story of Baba Jaga helping local people by making potions. So far the game is available only in Polish language.
